name: GO MIAMI GO. GO MI AMIGO.
description: I think I just came up with a new slogan for the city of Miami. I'll expect some royalty checks...please and thank you. lol I love playing with the concept of negative space within words. Look at what is possible within certain words. Doesn't seem like much, but you can completely change the context of a sentence with simply moving a space between letters. These types of works always bring a little joy to my life. I like to call them small victories of consciousness. Will this save the world? Absolutely not. Is this important to anyone but me? Probably not and that's ok. This is one of the things I've been learning about the ego through Buddhism and Taoism; opening my mind to new experiences and less about what my ego wants. I'm trying to think bigger as an artist, but more importantly as a human being.
